projects.name: CustomFishing
projects.description: CustomFishing is a Minecraft Plugin that re-invents the fishing experience. With all new loot accompanied with custom effects and sounds, it leads to an all new experience. This was alot of fun implementing an envisioned game design concept and seeing it come to life.

projects.name: CustomTab
projects.description: CustomTab is a Minecraft Plugin that re-invents information display in a custom way. It allows the usually boring player tab list to be customized with unique layouts, animating text elements, and even custom images!
